note.p: Career: Tuscan nobleman; converted to Protestantism
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Oldenburg, II, p. 457
References: Susana Gomez Lopez, 'The Royal Society and Post-Galilean Science in Italy' in NR 1997 vol 51 pp 35-44
W E Knowles Middleton, 'Some Italian Visitors to the Early Royal Society' in NR 1978-9 vol 33 pp 157-173
